My Work

This is some of my work

First project listed is a small Youtube-App, this app is React.js in the front-end. Dependencies used in Node.js are Axios, Material-UI/Core, and DOTENV. The app will play the top 6 most relevant Youtube videos you search for.

Project Github

Second project listed is gathering the information of successful lauches of space rockets and the details of the rocket. Dependencies used are React.js, Apollo, GraphQL, Node.Js, and Express.Js.

Project Github

Third Project listed is a houseplant-app that will help you list the houseplants you have collected. All you need to do is make an account and sign in. Technologies used are React.Js, Axios, Express, and Mongoose.

Project Github
